name.jp: 野望のドラゴンマント

description.en: The Master's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.ar: The Master's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.br: A Capa Dragão do Mestre aumenta todos os atributos base em +7 e vida (HP) máxima em +300. O Selo do Dragão é exibido com destaque.
description.cns: 全属性+7和最大HP+300，强者的象征。
description.de: Der Meisterumhang des Drachen erhöht alle Statuswerte um +7 und deine Lebenspunkte um +300. Das Siegel des Drachen wird deutlich sichtbar angezeigt.
description.fi: The Master's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.fil: The Master's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.fr: La Cape du Dragon Intrépide augmente toutes les statistiques de base de +7 et les Points de Vie de 300. Le sceau du dragon est bien en vue.
description.id: The Master's Dragon Cloakr meningkatkan all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Dragon ditampilkan dengan jelas.
description.it: The Master's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.jp: 野望のドラゴンマントは、すべてのステータスが+7、HP最大値が+300増加します。ドラゴンの紋章が際立つ。
description.kr: 마스터의 드래곤 망토는 모든 기본 능력치를 +7, 최대 체력을 +300 만큼 증가시킵니다. 용의 인장이 눈에 띄게 표시됩니다.
description.nl: The Master's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.pl: The Master's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.ru: The Master's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.sp: La Capa Dragón del Maestro aumenta todas las estadísticas base en +7 y la HP Máxima en +300. El Sello del Dragón se muestra de forma destacada.
description.sw: The Master's Dragon Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Dragon is prominently displayed.
description.th: Master's Dragon Cloak เพิ่มค่าสถานะพื้นฐานทั้งหมด +7 และ HP สูงสุด +300 ตราประทับของมังกรปรากฏอย่างเด่นชัด
description.tw: 慾望斗篷增加+7的基本屬性和最大HP+300。龍印顯現在斗篷上。
description.vi: Áo choàng rồng của Bậc thầy tăng tất cả các chỉ số cơ bản lên +7 và HP tối đa lên +300. Dấu ấn của Rồng được hiển thị nổi bật.
